briefTitle: Immunogenicity and Safety of Sci-B-Vac® to Engerix-B® in Adults
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Double-Blind Randomized Controlled Trial to Compare the Immunogenicity and Safety of a Three-dose Regimen of Sci-B-Vac® to a Three-dose Regimen of Engerix-B® in Adults (PROTECT)
summary: This study is a double-blind randomized controlled trial designed to establish the non-inferiority of Sci-B-Vac® compared to Engerix-B® in adults ≥ 18 years old and the superiority of Sci-B-Vac® compared to Engerix-B® in ≥ 45 years old.

primaryOutcome.measure: Seroprotection Rate (SPR) Defined as Percentage of Adults ≥ 18 Years Old Achieving Anti-HBs Levels of ≥10 mIU/mL in Serum at Study Day 196
